🔄Our 7-Day Return Policy📢

✔️You must inspect the package immediately after you receive it, and test it for 4-6 days before clicking the "Order Receive" button, in case the TV is defective or damaged from the factory.

✔️After you apply for a return refund, the warehouse must inspect your return after receiving your return. When the warehouse thinks your return meets their return requirements, we will pass your request and return the money to your Shopee Wallet. If it takes too long, you can also contact customer service to update your refund/return.

⭕Warm reminder 😉

✔️GELL TV has a one-year warranty, only the TV itself, other accessories are not covered by the warranty. Man-made damage, such as accidentally dropping the TV causing damage to the TV, or tampering with TV programming by other non-GELL employees rendering the TV unusable is not covered by our warranty.

✔️Please keep the original packaging and accessories of the TV during the warranty period, if lost, the after-sales warranty will not be available

✔️Please keep your bill of lading or air waybill properly, it will not be reissued if lost.

✔️ Defects or damages caused by accident, fire, flood, lighting or other natural disasters or unstable voltage are not covered under warranty.

Q:Adakah produk mempunyai jaminan?

A:Tempoh jaminan produk adalah 1 tahun. Sekiranya anda memerlukan perkhidmatan purna jual, sila hubungi kami melalui sembang, kami akan menyelesaikan semua masalah untuk anda



Q:Bolehkah saya pergi ke kedai untuk membelinya sendiri?

A:Pada masa ini, kami tidak mempunyai kedai fizikal, sila pesan dalam talian, kami akan menyerahkan produk tersebut kepada anda secepat mungkin



Q：Bolehkah pintar menggunakan fungsi WiFi / YouTube / Netflix?

A: TV pintar boleh disambungkan secara langsung ke WiFi melalui telefon bimbit atau kabel rangkaian untuk menggunakan fungsi YouTube / Netflix



Q:Apakah pembungkusan produk?

A:Pembungkusan kami mengandungi busa pelindung dan kotak kadbod, ia sangat kuat dan selamat, yakinlah.



Q:Adakah pembelian ansuran mungkin?

A：Kedai belum membuka fungsi pembayaran ansuran, anda boleh menggunakan kad kredit untuk membayar, dan kemudian membayar secara ansuran.

Get Free delivery & Wall Mount installation. Promotion Period: 16 Sep 2022 - 17 Nov 2022. Redemption Period: 21 Sep 2022 - 16 May 2023. T&Cs Apply; Reach out to CS for redemption. 
Samsung delivery team will contact customers within 3-7 working days from order date to schedule delivery slot.Delivery slots: Monday - Saturday between 10am - 6pm, except public holidays.Delivery should be arranged within 30 days from date of purchase.Installation includes table-top set up, basic wiring, cable connection setup and simple demonstration.Free wall mount installation must be requested before delivery and have to done on the same trip. Subsequent trips or requests to make adjustments will be chargeable.Upon request of wall mount installation by our team, basic no-gap wall mount kit will be included. No wall mount bracket will be provided for table-top installation. Customer can also opt to use own/existing TV bracket. Separate charges may apply for wall mounting on special surfaces e.g. marble, tiled wall etc.Exchange only permitted in cases of product/ cosmetic defects. Exchange request for different screen size is not allowed.Includes free disposal of old TV (LED, LCD, Flatscreen TVs). Separate charges apply for disposal of Projection TV and CRT TVs.TV trade-in: Refer to this website for more details https://www.samsung.com/sg/tvtradein/
